About This Page

The "Group Member Management" page contains the Friends:Group_Add function, which is an all-in-one function to manage group memberships. Using this same template and providing different segments in the URI, Friends:Group_Add knows when to make group invites, group requests, membership approvals, delete memberships, etc, and above all, send out the appropriate email notifications.

It makes use of the following functions:

  • Friends:Group_Add to manage every aspect of group memberships.
